author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Judge of Mahila Court, Liakath Ali, on Thursday, convicted and sentenced a 46-year-old person Mookan alias Murugan to 10 years’ imprisonment for having sexually assaulted a minor girl.

According to prosecution, Mookan had sexually assaulted a minor girl, his neighbour. The crime was committed on July 27, 2010.

The Viralimalai police registered a case under Sec 376 IPC (Rape) and arrested Mookan alias Murugan.

The judge who found him guilty, sentenced him to 10 years’ imprisonment. The judge ordered him to pay a fine of Rs.1,000.
title: Man sentenced to 10 years of imprisonment for raping minor
